config.ktnmentioned.filters.list.long: List of keywords to filter. Case-insensitive.
config.ktnmentioned.filters.self.long:
Enable if Mentioned should automatically include
your own username into the list. Avoid manually
adding username to the list.
config.ktnmentioned.misc.delay.long:
If non-zero and positive, this is the time
of which pings will be disabled once
you yourself send a message. Used to
avoid pinging yourself when chatting a lot.
Time is in milliseconds.
config.ktnmentioned.style.color.code.lon: Color code to use for the ping.
config.ktnmentioned.style.color.long:
Enable if ping highlight should
use the selected color code.
config.ktnmentioned.style.bold.long: Enable if ping highlight should be bold.
config.ktnmentioned.style.italic.long: Enable if ping highlight should be italic.
Enable if ping highlight should be strikethrough.
config.ktnmentioned.style.underline.long: Enable if ping highlight should be underline.
config.ktnmentioned.filter.filters.long: All filters in use seperated by semicolon (;).
config.ktnmentioned.filter.self.long: When enabled, includes your own name into the filter.
config.ktnmentioned.style.enable.color.l: When enabled, your filtered message will change color.
config.ktnmentioned.style.color.long: Color to use when styling a filtered message (Requires Enable Color).
config.ktnmentioned.style.enable.bold.lo: When enabled, your filtered message will appear bold.
When enabled, your filtered message will appear italic.
When enabled, your filtered message will appear strikethrough.
config.ktnmentioned.style.enable.under.l: When enabled, your filtered message will appear underlined.
